description:
8.88 extrastereo
Linearly increases the difference between left and right channels which
adds some sort of "live" effect to playback.

The filter accepts the following options:

m.description: Sets the difference coefficient. 0.0 means mono sound (average of both channels), with 1.0 sound will be unchanged, with -1.0 left and right channels will be swapped.

name: extrastereo

parameters.description: Sets the difference coefficient (default: 2.5). 0.0 means mono sound (average of both channels), with 1.0 sound will be unchanged, with -1.0 left and right channels will be swapped.
parameters.name: m

source:
8.88 extrastereo

Linearly increases the difference between left and right channels which adds some sort of "live" effect to playback.

The filter accepts the following options:

m

Sets the difference coefficient (default: 2.5). 0.0 means mono sound (average of both channels), with 1.0 sound will be unchanged, with -1.0 left and right channels will be swapped.

c

Enable clipping. By default is enabled.
